plot outline: Gopya is a crook at heart. The kid can single-handedly tarnish the image of his school and he does it too. But behind his actions is his family's condition. His father is a drunkard who doesn't earn much and her mother wants him to complete his education and make a name for himself. But he is not very interested in studies and his school principal is averse to the idea of conducting sports lessons. But a change of heart ensures that his school participates in a sports tournament. This gives him a change to show his potential and excel.
title: Gopya
plot: _Gopya_ (qv) is a crook at heart. The kid can single-handedly tarnish the image of his school and he does it too. But behind his actions is his family's condition. His father is a drunkard who doesn't earn much and her mother wants him to complete his education and make a name for himself. But he is not very interested in studies and his school principal is averse to the idea of conducting sports lessons. But a change of heart ensures that his school participates in a sports tournament. This gives him a change to show his potential and excel.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
